en_US: Hello.
May I help you with anything?
Hello, {STRVAR_1 3, 0, 0}.
May I help you with anything?
Would you care for a Protein?
It’s a drink that boosts Attack.
May I suggest a Carbos? It’s a drink
that boosts the base Speed stat.
When you need to make sure attacks hit
the target hard... Dire Hit is for you.
If your Pokémon has trouble with aim,
try treating it to an X Accuracy.
Where can I find matching dresses for
myself and my dear Pokémon?
I’m going to give an HP Up to
my KRICKETOT.
This is going to raise its HP, huh?
I’m getting the Carbos!
I should get a Protein instead, maybe.
But Iron’s not bad, either.
We’re giving away a Pokétch app for
free as a promotion.
I can give you the Counter app
over the counter. Would you like it?
OK, here you go.
Go forth and count!
I hope that Counter app I gave you
is useful.
You’re not interested? I’ll be here
if you change your mind.
B1F: Food & Produce
1F: Trainers’ Zone
2F: Battle Collection
3F: TM Corner
4F: Poké Dolls & Goods
5F: Rooftop Plaza
